bibl.title: The Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton. F.S.A. Volume II.
bibl.seg: Rees B.R., H.I. Bell and J.W.B. Barns, The Merton Papyri. A Descriptive Catalogue of the Greek Papyri in the Collection of Wilfred Merton. F.S.A. Volume II.
Dublin, Hodges Figgis, 1959, 8°, xiv-209 pp., 46 pll.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, JEA 48 (1962) pp. 178-179. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 39 (1959) pp. 390-391. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 30 (1961) pp. 247-248. - J.F. Gilliam, CP 56 (1961) pp. 140-141. - Naphtali Lewis, CJ 56 (1961) pp. 235-236; CW 54 (1960) p. 97. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 35 (1960) Nos 69-70, pp. 289-296. - Eric G. Turner, CR N.S., 10 (1960) pp. 235-236.
